Source code for havoc.autoval.lib.host.sshpass

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.connection_abstract import ConnectionAbstract



[docs]class SSHPassConn(ConnectionAbstract):

[docs]    def __init__(
        self,
        host,
        source_host,
        user=None,
        password=None,
    ):
        self.hostname = host
        self.source_host = source_host
        self.user = user
        self.password = password



[docs]    def run(
        self,
        cmd,
        get_result_obj=False,
        ignore_status=False,
        timeout=600,
        working_directory=None
    ):
        out = self.source_host.run(
            "timeout %s sshpass -p %s ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null "
            "%s@%s %s" % (
                timeout, self.password, self.user, self.hostname, cmd
            )
        )
        return out



[docs]    def read_file(self, file_path, decode_ascii=False):
        return

        return
